beer.beer_description:
Velkopopovický Kozel Dark beer is brewed to the original recipe using a special mix of dark malts, clean water from our own well close to the brewery, and a selection of the best hops. The caramelized malt gives this beer a unique ruby color and sweet flavor, thanks to which it is appreciated and respected all over the world.


Velkopopovický Kozel Černý je vyráběný podle původní receptury ze speciální směsi tmavých sladů, čisté vody a výběru toho nejlepšího chmele. Karamelizovaný slad dodává pivu jedinečnou rubínovou barvu a sladkou chuť, díky níž je tak ceněn a uznáván po celém světě.

Na rozdíl od jiných tmavých piv je pěna Černého Kozla tmavší.

items.badge_description: It's the final week! Week 4 wraps with the last 3 styles of this year's Year in Beer Style Hunt. You've just tried one of three available styles during the week.

At first taste, dark ales can be overwhelming for even the most skilled of beer drinkers, but your will is weak and with time you will eventually turn to the dark side. That's 150 different beers with the style of Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Lager - Dark, IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black, Schwarzbier, or Mild - Dark. Try 5 more for Level 31!

At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 220 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 45! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 5 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.badge_description: It's the final week! Week 4 wraps with the last 3 styles of this year's Year in Beer Style Hunt. You've just tried one of three available styles during the week.
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 280 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below.  Try 5 more for Level 57!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 310 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 63!

items.badge_description: It's the final week! Week 4 wraps with the last 3 styles of this year's Year in Beer Style Hunt. You've just tried one of three available styles during the week.
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 5 years on Untappd!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 3! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 10 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 3!
